name: SHITTY MECHANIC 2
description:
SHITTY MECHANIC 2 is an arabic car building game made by 1 developer , the game main goal is to build cars and bikes in an open world full of activities to do and explore you can customize your car with endless possibilities by painting specific car parts or removing car parts to make ur car look more badass , the game is made in unity engine and you can pick the full unity project in my page on itch io , the game took 5 months of developing . but its finally out :D

dont forget to join my discord come put some extra inches on ur pp there : https://discord.gg/8wrxmr3FvT
